item.description:
We're back on schedule with the monthly Atheist dinner. I will be making reservations at the Ixtapa Mexican Restaurant in Lunenburg. They did a great job the last time we were there.

As always, Please only RSVP YES if you are POSITIVE you can attend. I can't set this up for maybes because it is a fixed number group. We understand dropouts are unavoidable sometimes, but your YES could keep someone who could go from knowing that it's a possibility for them to attend. Thanks!

Again, and for newbies, most restaurants will not split the check for large parties so please bring cash! Any changes will be posted here.

-Chris
item.name: Atheist Meetup Dinner & Drinks
